name: Palm tree Defender
description:
Here is a game made for the third GameJam organised by MicroStudio. Given so  the theme of the GameJam, here is two squeletons defending 3 palm trees each, by throwing mutant bones on the three types of mutant dogs that want to pee on the palm trees.

The controls are: LEFT and A to pick a bone / UP and DOWN to move / RIGHT and X to throw a bone

To play with a friend you must connect a controller.

Credit to my math teacher who crearted the programation club at my school, I wouldn't have started to learn programming without him and he gave me a lot of idea for the GameJam so big thank to him. 

You can find bellow the version of the game still in programmer art (it's a way to say it's ugly)
